title: **GREAT DEALS ON 2 BEDROOMS  - Saint Louis Park Apt. Communities**
map_address: W. 30 1/2 Street near Virginia Avenue South
posting_body: ['***RENT SPECIAL: APPLY THE SAME DAY AS YOUR SHOWING & GET A $500 RENT CREDIT!', '*** CALL TODAY FOR MORE DETAILS', 'Christopherson Properties has 2 BR Apartments available for rent!', 'Why Choose Us?', 'We have multiple properties in prime Metro locations - so you can work with one Leasing Agent and still choose from multiple options, prices and properties.', 'Bonus ~ We have Month to Month Rental Agreements at no upcharge!', 'We are locally owned and operated and have been in business in the Metro for 40 years.', 'Market Rent Starting At  $1,250/Month- 2 bedrooms', 'Addresses of these Locations', '-----------------------------------', 'Aquila Court Apartments', '3033 Xylon Avenue South', '8225 & 8301 W. 30 1/2 Street', 'St Louis Park, MN 55426', 'Virginia Apartments', '3101 Virginia Avenue South', 'St. Louis Park, MN 55426', 'Virginia Court Apartments', '3025 & 3035 Virginia Avenue South', 'St. Louis Park, MN 55426', 'Virginia Terrace Apartments', '8201 W. 30 1/2 Street', 'St. Louis Park, MN 55426', 'Virginia Estates', '3109 Virginia Avenue', 'Saint Louis Park, MN 55426', 'These properties are convenient for commuters who want to be near Golden Valley, Plymouth, Downtown Minneapolis, and Uptown.', 'Call or email us today to schedule a showing or for more information!', 'These Apartments will go fast in these high-demand locations ~ call now', 'show contact info', 'Please visit our website for more pics at  <URL>', '*Cats are accepted.', '$250 non-refundable pet fee per cat and $30/month pet rent per cat.', 'Ask for full guidelines on Pet Policy.', "*Don't Wait ~ Prices and availability are subject to change at any time."]
